the structur of the the multiprogram system a multiprogram systemis describ in which all activ ar divid over anumber of sequenti process these sequenti process ar place atvariou hierarch level in each of which on or moreindepend abstract have been implement the hierarch structur prove tobe vital for the verif of the logic sound ofthe design and the correct of it implement cacm mai1968 dijkstra e w oper system multiprogram system system hierarchisystem structur real time debug program verif synchron primit coopersequenti process system level input output buffer multiprogram processor sharemultiprocess 4 30 4 32 ca680507 jb februari 23 19789 20 am 1749 5 1749 1749 5 1749 17495 1749 1828 5 1749 1854 5 1749 1877 51749 1960 5 1749 2150 5 1749 2317 5 17492319 5 1749 2342 5 1749 2376 5 1749 23775 1749 2379 5 1749 2424 5 1749 2482 51749 2618 5 1749 2632 5 1749 2704 5 17492723 5 1749 2738 5 1749 2740 5 1749 27415 1749 2867 5 1749 3184 5 1749 1198 61749 1198 6 1749 1198 6 1749 1198 6 17491198 6 1749 1198 6 1749 1247 6 1749 13386 1749 1338 6 1749 1338 6 1749 1408 61749 1421 6 1749 1471 6 1749 1471 6 17491471 6 1749 1471 6 1749 1471 6 1749 15266 1749 1549 6 1749 1552 6 1749 1572 61749 1693 6 1749 1719 6 1749 1746 6 17491748 6 1749 1748 6 1749 1749 6 1749 17496 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 61749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 17491749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 17496 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 61749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 17491749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 1749 6 1749 17496 1749 1751 6 1749 1753 6 1749 1781 61749 1826 6 1749 210 6 1749 1854 6 17491877 6 1749 1877 6 1749 1877 6 1749 19606 1749 2016 6 1749 2017 6 1749 2080 61749 2080 6 1749 2080 6 1749 2080 6 17492126 6 1749 2148 6 1749 2188 6 1749 22036 1749 2204 6 1749 2228 6 1749 2228 61749 2247 6 1749 2247 6 1749 2256 6 17492356 6 1749 2356 6 1749 2358 6 1749 23796 1749 2379 6 1749 2454 6 1749 2651 61749 2673 6 1749 2777 6 1749 557 6 1749627 6 1749 731 6 1749
